title: What tips can you give someone trying to write a song? - Writing & Blogging - Quora

response.answer_text: find a title, you like for the song, look up the words in the title, look the words up a thesaurus, which will give you words that mean the same or similar, and practice writing lines with those words from the thesaurus, with the definition of the main title of the songs title in mind, and practice.
